title: BRIT Awards 2017: Watch Coldplay and the Chainsmokers Perform “Something Just Like This” | Pitchfork
text:
BRIT Awards 2017: Watch Coldplay and the Chainsmokers Perform “Something Just Like This” Their just-released collaborative single from the Chainsmokers’ upcoming album Photo by Gareth Cattermole/Getty Images 
Coldplay and the Chainsmokers gave a surprise performance at the 2017 BRIT Awards tonight. They played “ Something Just Like This ,” their new collaborative single, which was released shortly before the performance. Watch it below. “Something Just Like This” will appear on the Chainsmoker’s upcoming debut, Memories... Do Not Open . Earlier in the show, Chris Martin performed during the BRITs’ George Michael tribute . Coldplay and The Chainsmokers perform Something Just Like This at the #BRITs https://t.co/kMlNpX8qji pic.twitter.com/DDRoYtK9ek
